movies.name: The Matrix Reloaded
movies.overview: Six months after the events depicted in The Matrix, Neo has proved to be a good omen for the free humans, as more and more humans are being freed from the matrix and brought to Zion, the one and only stronghold of the Resistance. Neo himself has discovered his superpowers including super speed, ability to see the codes of the things inside the matrix and a certain degree of pre-cognition. Denmeme

movies.name: Blitz
movies.overview: A tough, renegade cop with a gay sidekick is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers. AÇIKLAMA AÇIKLAMA

movies.name: Sherlock Holmes
movies.overview: Sherlock Holmes is a fictional detective created by British author Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. Referring to himself as a "consulting detective" in the stories, Holmes is known for his proficiency with ...

movies.name: Harry Potter
movies.overview: Harry Potter is a series of seven fantasy novels written by British author J. K. Rowling. The novels chronicle the lives of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
